function NPC_512002:Init( NPCID ) --[[ 1: 2: 공포의장막 누적데미지 --]] NPC_ReserveUserData( NPCID, 2 )
-- 최대 체력의 1/20 의 피해량을 누적시켜야한다. + 실드 자체 데미지 감소율 -95% 을 감안한 수치 -- 0.8를 곱하는 이유? -> (2012.07.08 일반납골당 밸런스 패치) 실드 부시는 임계데미지 너프 -20% NPC_512002.LimitForBreakShield = (NPC_512002.MaxHP/20)/20 * 0.8
NPC_512002.BufIdShieldOfDarkness = 40320
NPC_512002.NpcIdPSphere = 512005 NPC_512002.NpcIdMSphere = 512006
NPC_512002.TalIdModeChange1 = 251200220 NPC_512002.TalIdModeChange2 = 251200221 NPC_512002.TalIdModeChange3 = 251200222 NPC_512002.TalIdDeclareDarkness = 251200214
NPC_512002.TTLElectricOrb = 20 end
function NPC_512002:OnBPartRecover() for i=1, 2 do this:SetUserData( i, 0 ) end end
function NPC_512002:OnActSummonPlusSphere( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_512002:OnFinishSummonPlusSphere\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3( -300, 0, 0 ) ) local Minion = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_512002.NpcIdPSphere, WorldPos )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_512002:OnActSummonMinusSphere( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_512002:OnFinishSummonMinusSphere\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3( 300, 0, 0 ) ) local Minion = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_512002.NpcIdMSphere, WorldPos )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_512002:OnActSummonSpheres( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_512002:OnActSummonSpheres\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3( -300, 0, 0 ) ) local PSphere = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_512002.NpcIdPSphere, WorldPos )
local WorldPos = Math_LocalToWorld( ThisNPC:GetDir(), ThisNPC:GetPos(), vec3( 300, 0, 0 ) ) local MSphere = ThisNPC:SummonNow( NPC_512002.NpcIdMSphere, WorldPos )
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_512002:DeclareDarkness( ThisActor, Enemy ) --GLog( "NPC_512002:DeclareDarkness\n" ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
local NewEnemy = ThisNPC:Aggro( "random", 0 ) if ThisNPC:IsCooldown( NPC_512002.TalIdDeclareDarkness ) then return end
ThisNPC:UseTalent( NPC_512002.TalIdDeclareDarkness, NewEnemy ) end
function NPC_512002:OnStartShieldOfDarkness( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC(ThisActor)
ThisNPC:GainBuff( NPC_512002.BufIdShieldOfDarkness ) end
function NPC_512002:OnFinishShieldOfDarkness( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor) -- 공포의 장막 누적데미지 리셋 ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) end
function NPC_512002:OnFinishAndAggroShort( ThisActor, Enemy ) local ThisNPC = AsNPC( ThisActor)
ThisNPC:Aggro( "short", 0 ) end
function NPC_512002:AccDamage( ThisNPC, HitInfo ) -- 공포의 보호막 버프 처리
if ThisNPC:CheckBuff( NPC_512002.BufIdShieldOfDarkness ) then local ShieldDmgAcc = ThisNPC:GetUserData( 2 ) + HitInfo.Damage
if ShieldDmgAcc > NPC_512002.LimitForBreakShield then -- 보호막 깨짐 처리 ThisNPC:RemoveBuff( NPC_512002.BufIdShieldOfDarkness ) ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, 0 ) HitInfo.Damage = ShieldDmgAcc - NPC_512002.LimitForBreakShield else -- 보호막 데미지 누적및 실데미지 무효화 ThisNPC:SetUserData( 2, ShieldDmgAcc ) end
return HitInfo end
--- mode change local HPPer = ThisNPC:GetHP()/ThisNPC:GetMaxHP() if ThisNPC:GetMode() == 0 and HPPer < 0.9 then ThisNPC:ClearJob() --GLog( "ModeChange1 " .. NPC_512002.TalIdModeChange1 .. "\n") ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512002.TalIdModeChange1 ) elseif ThisNPC:GetMode() == 1 and HPPer < 0.5 then --GLog( "ModeChange2 \n") ThisNPC:ClearJob() ThisNPC:BreakPart( 1, HitInfo.Attacker ) ThisNPC:UseTalentSelf( NPC_512002.TalIdModeChange2 ) end
return HitInfo end
function NPC_512002:OnHitCapsule_1_0( HitInfo ) return NPC_512002:AccDamage( this, HitInfo ) end
